item.title: My take on Falafel Wrap
item.description: IMPORTANT NOTE: Any mentions of products and its manufacturer or links to products are not endorsement. They are purely for reference purpose only. Here is my take on falafel wrap. Its different from the traditional one but equally healthy and delicious. My version involves a salad prepared from baked veggies and quick and easy to make dressing. Gotta love your Veggies ! The very first step is to take all the veggies you love and roughly chop it.
